entry.string: Invalid user (#(1)) or wrong password while creating new post
entry.translation: Infeleed user (#(1)) oor vrung pessvurd vheele-a creeteeng noo pust

entry.string: Failed to create new post #(1) (permission problem?)
entry.translation: Feeeled tu creete-a noo pust #(1) (permeessiun prublem?)
